This species was transferred by Nomura (1977) without studying any type specimens. Coca-Abia (2008) studied and designated a lectotype and a paralectotype of
M. hybrida
, confirming its transfer to
Miridiba
. This species shows features of external morphology and male genitalia, which characterize morphotype I “
Trichophora
”. Hence, this species is included in this genital morphotype.
